articles.title: 'Embarassing': Actress Kimberly Chia hospitalised after injuring back while brushing her teeth
articles.summary:
📰 취업, 기술 관련 뉴스
📢 'Embarassing': Actress Kimberly Chia hospitalised after injuring back while brus...
articles.content: Home-grown actress Kimberly Chia has revealed the "embarrassing" reason for her recent hospitalisation. "I was already having back pains. "Then came Thursday morning, when I was preparing for work and brushing my teeth. "It was a sharp pain that made me see stars. Blacked out but still conscious," she wrote. I was crying and I couldn't move

articles.content: SINGAPORE: “Do you feel lonely in Singapore too?” a local Reddit user asked in a post on Monday morning (Jul 21).
